name: Parser_parseBodyFragmentTest
description: Unit tests for the Parser.parseBodyFragment method which parses HTML fragments into a Document object.

test_cases.name: testParseBodyFragment
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of a simple HTML fragment into a Document object and verifies the structure of the resulting Document.

test_cases.name: testParseBodyFragmentWithEmptyBody
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of an empty HTML fragment into a Document object and verifies that the body has no child nodes.

test_cases.name: testParseBodyFragmentWithMultipleNodes
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of an HTML fragment with multiple nodes into a Document object and verifies the structure of the resulting Document.
